assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study constitutes a retrospective evaluation of clinical data and was part of a quality assessment project at the Department of Clinical Genetics in Lund. Informed written consent for cancer genetic investigation was collected from each proband as part of the clinical routine.
